exceptions.exn: Tactic failure: The relation eq_mem is not a declared reflexive relation. Maybe you need to require the Coq.Classes.RelationClasses library.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
f: input -> option nat
prec: input -> bool
prec_valid: forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v
cls: seq nid
cs: seq nid
Huniq: is_true (uniq nodes)
this: Equality.sort nat_eqType
d: dstatelet
s: heap

Goal:
this \in nodes -> CalCoh d -> dom (upd this s (dstate d)) =i nodes

Premises:
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
Notation nodes := (cs ++ cls)
Some : ?A -> option ?A where ?A : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap |- Type]
CalCoh = CohPred (CohPredMixin l1 l2 l3) : Coherence.cohpred (fun=> [eta nodes])
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
nat_eqType = EqType nat nat_eqMixin : eqType
uniq : seq ?T -> bool where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap |- eqType]
dom : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (cT : union_map_class K V), cT -> seq K
dstate = fun d : dstatelet => let (dstate, _) := d in dstate : dstatelet -> lstate_type heap
nid = nat : Set
Notation heap := Heap.heap
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
upd : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (cT : union_map_class K V), K -> V -> cT -> cT
Notation seq := list
input = seq nat : Set
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
eqP : reflect (?x = ?y) (?x == ?y) where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap |- eqType] ?x : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap |- Equality.sort ?T] ?y : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap |- Equality.sort ?T]
pts : ?K -> ?V -> ?cT where ?K : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap |- ordType] ?V : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap |- Type] ?cT : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap |- union_map_class ?K ?V]
UMC.to : UM.base ?V (UMC.p (UMC.class ?cT)) -> ?cT where ?K : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap |- ordType] ?V : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap |- Type] ?cT : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap |- union_map_class ?K ?V]
mem : ?pT -> mem_pred ?T where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap |- Type] ?pT : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap |- predType ?T]
Mem : ?pT -> Mem_Pred ?T where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap |- Type] ?pT : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap |- PredType ?T]
supp : finMap ?K ?V -> seq ?K where ?K : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap |- ordType] ?V : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap |- Type]
unzip1 : seq (?S * ?T) -> seq ?S where ?S : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap |- Type] ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap |- Type]
unzip2 : seq (?S * ?T) -> seq ?T where ?S : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap |- Type] ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap |- Type]
Protocols.snd_tags : seq (send_trans ?coh) -> seq nat where ?nodes : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap |- dstatelet -> pred nid] ?coh : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap |- cohpred ?nodes]
Protocols.rcv_tags : seq (receive_trans ?coh) -> seq nat where ?nodes : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap |- dstatelet -> pred nid] ?coh : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap |- cohpred ?nodes]
ins : ?K -> ?V -> finMap ?K ?V -> finMap ?K ?V where ?K : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap |- ordType] ?V : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap |- Type]
valid : ?cT -> bool where ?cT : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap |- pcm]
PCM.join : ?cT -> ?cT -> ?cT where ?cT : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap |- pcm]
Unit : ?cT where ?cT : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap |- pcm]
cat : seq ?T -> seq ?T -> seq ?T where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap |- Type]
pred1 : ?T -> simpl_pred ?T where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap |- eqType]
in_mem : ?T -> mem_pred ?T -> bool where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap |- Type]
all : pred ?T -> seq ?T -> bool where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap |- Type]
eq_op : rel ?T where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap |- eqType]
ssrbool.SimplPred : pred ?T -> simpl_pred ?T where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap |- Type]
pred_of_seq : seq_eqclass ?T -> {pred ?T} where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap |- eqType]
simpl_of_mem : mem_pred ?T -> simpl_pred ?T where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap |- Type]
eq_mem : mem_pred ?T -> mem_pred ?T -> Prop where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap |- Type]
idP : reflect ?b1 ?b1 where ?b1 : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap |- bool]
predU : pred ?T -> pred ?T -> simpl_pred ?T where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nat_eqType d : dstatelet s : heap |- Type]
CohPredMixin : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d) -> Coherence.mixin_of nodes coh
Coherence.Mixin : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d) -> Coherence.mixin_of nodes coh
locE : forall (i : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (n : nid) (k : Label) (x : heap) (y : soup), k \in dom i -> valid i -> valid (dstate (getStatelet i k)) -> getLocal n (getStatelet (upd k {| dstate := upd n x (dstate (getStatelet i k)); dsoup := y |} i) k) = x
l3 : forall d : dstatelet, calcoh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes
calcoh = fun d : dstatelet => [/\ soupCoh (dsoup d), dom (dstate d) =i nodes, valid (dstate d) & forall n : nat_eqType, n \in nodes -> localCoh n (getLocal n d)] : dstatelet -> Prop
cohDom : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (d : dstatelet), d \In coh -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d
step_preserves_node_ids : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (l : Label), l \in dom s1 -> network_step w this s1 s2 -> dom (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)) =i dom (dstate (getStatelet s2 l))
Coh_dom : forall (w : world) (l : Label) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet), l \in dom s -> Coh w s -> dom (dstate (getStatelet s l)) =i Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)
network_step_sind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : SProp), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
network_step_ind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : Prop), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
Record protocol : Type := Protocol { nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid; plab : Ordered.sort Label; coh : cohpred nodes; snd_trans : seq (send_trans coh); rcv_trans : seq (receive_trans coh); snd_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.snd_tags snd_trans)); rcv_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.rcv_tags rcv_trans)) } Arguments Protocols.Protocol [nodes]%function_scope _ [coh] [snd_trans rcv_trans]%seq_scope
pred0v3 : forall d : dstatelet, cohMT d -> dom (dstate d) =i [::]
Record mixin_of (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet) : Prop := Mixin { _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d); _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d); _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d } Arguments Coherence.mixin_of _%function_scope Arguments Coherence.Mixin [nodes]%function_scope [coh] (_ _ _)%function_scope
InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.cohIDom : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (d : dstatelet), InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.cohI p I d -> dom (dstate d) =i Protocols.Exports.nodes p d
um_eta : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (f : U), k \in dom f -> exists v : V, find k f = Some v /\ f = pts k v \+ free k f

```  
intros. unfold CalCoh, dom. intros Hin_nodes Hcoh. unfold upd. rewrite ffunE. reflexivity.
